channel.title: Hitmarks (pi) Help please
channel.description:
Well im using Deathlypvpzv3 as a base to for some reason the only hit mark that is working is the defence icon. Anybody know why the others do not work?
As you can see the defense hitmark works but when i do melee mage or range no hit marks show up on the rockcrab. [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93756338/hitmarks.png[/img]

item.title: Hitmarks (pi) Help please

Lol because it doesnt have those added. Easy to add, many tuts. Use google.
